fields.name: DD_Payment_Is_Not_Available_Text
fields.fieldText:
Unfortunately, direct debit membership payment is not available at this time.


﻿Please click Next to choose a different payment option.

fields.name: Payment_Details_Info
fields.fieldText:
Pay by credit/debit card



To pay by credit or debit card using the secure Worldpay system, please select 'Proceed to payment'. You'll be redirected to the Worldpay site to complete your payment.


We don't see or store any of your debit or credit card information.


Please note: Credit cards levy higher charges on us than debit cards. We'd be grateful to you for supporting our charity by using a debit card if possible.

fields.name: Pay_For_Courses

How would you like to pay for your course?﻿

fields.name: Pay_For_Membership
fields.fieldText:
{!Line_Image}


﻿How would you like to pay for your NCT membership?

textTemplates.name: Membership_12_Template
textTemplates.text:
12 month membership

12 months money off baby supplies, holidays and services when you help us continue being the leading charity for pregnancy and young families. £48 (or £12 per quarter)

textTemplates.name: Membership_18_Template
textTemplates.text:
18 month memberships

18 months money off baby supplies, holidays and services when you help us continue being the leading charity for pregnancy and young families. £57 (or £9.50 per quarter)
